LanguageData.Apparel_QRShieldBelt.label: quick-recharge shield belt
LanguageData.Apparel_QRShieldBelt.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range.\n\nThis advanced version recharges more quickly at the cost of a reduced maximum charge.
LanguageData.Apparel_HeavyShieldBelt.label: heavy shield belt
LanguageData.Apparel_HeavyShieldBelt.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range.\n\nThis advanced version has a much higher maximum charge at the cost of a slower recharge rate.
LanguageData.Apparel_RangedShieldBelt.label: ranged shield belt
LanguageData.Apparel_RangedShieldBelt.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range.\n\nThis advanced version allows the wearer to fire outward, but the increased energy expenditure makes it weaker and slower to recharge.
